text: [Music]
hello I am Moulton with AWS in this
video I'm going to describe how to use a
file lock feature in Amazon work dock
with this feature you can lock files for
editing to make sure that no one
overrides your changes while you're
working by locking your file you no
longer need to coordinate your changes
with other collaborators you can do this
from the web client or the mobile app
let's look at how to lock and unlock a
file I am a contributor on this file and
want to lock it so I can make sure no
one else updates a file while I'm
editing it to lock the file I click on
the file Action menu and select lock
when the file is locked I can see a
brief message that the file is locked
and a lock icon is displayed next to the
file names when other contributors go to
the lock file they will also see a lock
icon next to the file name and a message
telling them that I lock this file and
when I locked it now I'm going to edit
the file I will access it from the sinks
work docs folder on my hard drive
once I'm done editing I will save my
changes which will then be synced back
to work Docs going back to the web
client I can see my updates in the
locked version I am the only user who
can see this version of the file until I
unlock the file to unlock the file I
click on the file Action menu and select
unlock and save changes or unlock and
discard changes saving the changes makes
them visible to other collaborators
discarding the changes will revert to
the latest version before I lock the
file now let's take a look at a file
that has been locked by another user I
can tell that the file is locked by the
lock icon next to the file name because
the file is locked I can't upload a new
version until it's been unlocked however
I'd like to edit this file I can request
that the file be unlocked directly from
the file action menu I want this request
to go to the person who lock the file as
well as the owners of the file who can
also unlock it so I'm going to check
this box the user who locked the file as
well as the file owners will
email notification with my request a
link to unlock the file and the comment
I added we covered how to lock unlock
files and request the file to be
unlocked in Amazon work Docs
I hope you found this helpful thank you
for watching
[Music]
